summary:
This mod adds a lot of spells to skyrim .. THIS MOD IS NOT FINISHED
I HAVE A LOT SPELLS TO ADD. SÃ¥ just stay tuned and download updates.
descriptionHtml:
[IMG=center]http://i.imgur.com/ooRrD.png[/IMG]
[b][center] Version 1.0 [/b][/center]


[center]If you like this mod, [i]please[/i] don\'t forget to endorse; it\'s my only reward for the time and effort I spend on it![/center]


[heading]What is this?[/heading]

This mod will add so far 4 spells (No worry, i will update almost every day)
[line]
Spells added:[list]
     [*]Breath of fire - A wall of fire that explodes when contact. Used in both hands and used       combined will enhance the explosion 3 times. 
     [*]Throw Voice - Fool your enemies to go whereever you cast the spell
     [*]Freeze - Freezeyour enemies solide for a hole minute
     [*]Mass force - Push all your foes aside with the spell of dah
[/list]

[heading]How to obtain the spells?[/heading]

Just head to whiterun and stop by your old house breezehome.
the spell books will be very close to the entrance.


[heading]Future plans[/heading]
[list]
     [*]Add a new NPC that will have the spells, then you have to buy the spells
     [*]Adding more spells, im not stopping until i have no more ideas
     [*]Adding new shouts
[/list]


[heading]Installation:[/heading]

[u][b]Manual:[/b][/u]
Drag and drop \"ASAP.esp\" into your Data folder.
Data folder is located at: C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data

[u][b]NNM:[/b][/u]
Add the RAR file into NNM (or download via NMM) and activate \"ASAP\" in Nexus Mod Manager.


[heading]Uninstallation:[/heading]

[u][b]Manual:[/b][/u]
Delete \"ASAP\" from your Data folder.

[u][b]NMM:[/b][/u]
Deactivate \"ASAP\" in Nexus Mod Manager.


[heading]Version History:[/heading]

[b][u]v1.0[/u]:[/b] Initial Release!


I [i]need[/i] feedback from you guys, and I want to hear your ideas and opinions. 
I am going to be updating this mod quite often, because I\'m working a lot on it.


[heading]My other mods[/heading]

More of Breezehome
[b][u]Link[/u]:[/b] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20847]More of Breezehome[/url]


[heading]Contact Me/Report a Bug:[/heading]

Please report bugs ore other thing that you have on your mind.
[u][b]Email[/u]:[/b] ameland97@gmail.com
[b][u]Nexus[/u]:[/b] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/3672501]RedModder[/url]


[center][i]Is something missing in this description?
Do you want more info?[/i]

Tell me and i will update that as well :)

[b]Have a good day![/b][/center]
author: AndSy
